Detailed Description

template<unsigned D, typename N = double>
template<unsigned D_>
struct VecMath::Matrix< D, N >::VecMath::Matrix::ConstructLoop< D_, 0, 0 >

Initialization of a unity D x D matrix.

Specialization for row = 0, column = 0

Member Function Documentation

template<unsigned D, typename N = double>
template<unsigned D_>
static void VecMath::Matrix< D, N >::VecMath::Matrix::ConstructLoop< D_, 0, 0 >::row_loop ( N  a[D][D]  )  [inline, static]

Sets element[0][0] to 1.

element[0][0] is on the diagonal, so setting it to 1 is what we need in a unity matrix
